I've been experiencing thickening of the skin and plaques on both my nipple and areola areas for the past 4 weeks.

No, there has been no discharge from the nipple, but the skin has become darker (hyperpigmented).

No, I do not have a personal or family history of warts, skin conditions, or breast cancer.

I have thickening of the skin and plaques on both sides of my nipple and areola area.
